title: Decent White Watch Face
summary: Magnifier is a Decent Single Hand watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others
description: Model NumberEF-A10CategoryDecentProduct description Magnifier is a decent Single Hand watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic  (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features	Custom Ambient  Mode	square & round watches supportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu) Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface  Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface Follow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293It has following featuresFeatures: 	Custom Ambient  Mode	square & round watches supportFor Email support Contact us at  elitewatchface@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Magnifier Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
EF-A10

Category
Decent

Product description

Magnifier is a decent Single Hand watch face for all smart watches, a gentle sober touch makes it magnetic (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

 Custom Ambient Mode
 square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293
It has following features

Features:

 Custom Ambient Mode
 square & round watches support

For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Magnifier Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
comments: Crashes Works for about a second before repeatedly crashing. It also forces a daily notification to rate it. Well here's your rating, happy now?
Crashes App crashes once activated on my moto 360. Please fix.
Keeps crashing Crashing on moto 360 sport and on the phone too.
Asked me to rate it 5 stars 4 times in 45 seconds after install
Crashed as soon as it loaded
Perfect. Simple and elegant. Love it.
